Option.name: AutoSave Interval in Minutes
Option.HelpText: This sets how frequently the Scene Designer will make a backup of your unsaved scene. Enter a value of '0' to disable the Auto-Save feature.

Option.name: Palette Folder Location
Option.HelpText: This sets the location of the palette folder for the scene. This setting overrides the the Default Palette location. If this setting is blank, the default folder location is used.

Option.name: External Application Path
Option.HelpText: The full path to an external application to launch.

Option.name: External Application Command Line
Option.HelpText: Command-line parameters to use for the external application.
